description: Agile fighter specialized at long range attacks.

weapons.name: Rail Gun
weapons.description: Targetted long range piercing attack. Stuns all targets hit.

weapons.name: Afterburner
weapons.description: Drastically increases speed for a short period of time.

weapons.name: Space Mine
weapons.description: Lays down a spacemine which will detonate when an enemy flies within its range. Enemies hit by the mine will be stunned for a short time.

weapons.name: Solar Flare
weapons.description: A targetted long range channeling attack that will do increasing damage over time. Targets hit within the beam will be slowed.
